EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_PCF 1.6 Launch_Q415.Last Chance Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register - The New Release of Pivotal Cloud Foundry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The End of Slow. Can your development team move from an idea to production in less than a day?
<http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/expand-your-cloud-native-platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pcf-16-announcement>
It’s never been easier for enterprise teams to convert to Cloud Native patterns for development, testing and operations.
The latest release of Pivotal Cloud Foundry® <http://pivotal.io/platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pcf-16-announcement> brings together the key principles of modern Cloud Native software development into a turnkey platform and brings you frameworks for the latest architectural styles.
Integrated Microservices with Spring Cloud Services Simplify and accelerate development of modern, microservices-based cloud applications with the only enterprise-ready, turnkey distribution of core Netflix OSS components.
Native Support for .NET and Docker Run both your .NET applications and Docker images on Pivotal Cloud Foundry as first class application workloads.
Continuous Delivery of your Cloud Native Applications Build and deploy microservices and Cloud Native applications with on-platform integrations of GitLab, CloudBees Jenkins and JFrog.
Pivotal Cloud Foundry on Microsoft Azure With early access support to Pivotal Cloud Foundry on Microsoft Azure, customers can now deploy and manage Cloud Native applications in addition to the already-supported Amazon Web Services® (AWS), VMware vSphere®, VMware vCloud Air® and OpenStack®.
Questions? Want to explore more? Check out the upcoming webinar <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/expand-your-cloud-native-platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pcf-16-announcement> where you can find out more about all these enhancements and chat with our product experts.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
<http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/expand-your-cloud-native-platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pcf-16-announcement>
